descriptor: Blockchain Contract Management Service by iCRAFT
caution: After the acceptance or cancellation of the contract, its automatic registration in the network will occur.
downloadDescription: To view the contract please download it by clicking on the button.
deleteContractDescription: If you think that this contract was sent by mistake or the contract needs correction, click 'DELETE'
contractDescription: If you agree to the contract, click on the 'APPROVE' button, otherwise click 'DECLINE'
home_title: Record information about the contract via blockchain
home_first_block_1_text: is a form of contract in which an electronic file is exchanged over the Internet, an electronic signature is used instead of ordinary paper and printing. Unlike paper contracts, the work during the conclusion of the contract (printing, sealing, mailing) can be simplified, and what used to take several days can be completed in a few minutes.
home_first_block_2_text: use a blockchain with a high degree of protection against unauthorized access. By using blockchain-based electronic signatures and timestamps instead of signature stamps, substitution and falsification can be prevented.
home_first_block_3_text: is a blockchain mechanism that automates the management of contract execution, for example, [when certain conditions are met, predefined processing is automatically performed] for a certain contract or transaction. Even in cases where it is difficult to carry out procedures in cooperation between related companies, it is possible to automate the transaction process by automatically performing transactions on the network in accordance with the established rules.
home_second_block_left_text: Even without an administrator, this is a mechanism that can prevent data loss and unauthorized interference.
home_second_block_middle_text: Blockchain increases security by managing the same data on multiple computers. Thus, highly secure data management can be implemented.
home_second_block_right_text: In the blockchain, several nodes store the same information. As a result, it increases security and at the same time preserves the transparency of information.
home_third_block_1_line_text: A smart contract is a mechanism that automatically executes various contracts.
home_third_block_2_line_text: As a common example - a drink that appears at the moment when you put money in the vending machine and click on the drink (the contract is concluded).
home_third_block_3_line_text: This system is written on a blockchain in the P2P network, which is characterized by ensuring the transparency of the contract.
home_third_block_4_line_text: The operation is automatic, processing the transfer of assets between users, even if the service does not have an administrator.
home_fourth_block_first_line_text: The biggest feature of the blockchain is a mechanism that can increase reliability and prevent forgery by recording data with each other even without the participation of an administrator. Unlike the usual method focused on a single server, data is not concentrated in one place because it creates a network-like system. Thus, it has the advantage that it is difficult to disconnect it from the system.
home_fourth_block_second_line_text: The traditional idea of data security is to store data on a single server and create a reliable security system that protects this data. On the other hand, blockchain increases security by managing the same data on multiple computers. Even if you rewrite some data, it is difficult to rewrite everything, because the data is linked like a chain, and data management is carried out in several places. In addition, the transaction data stored in the block is encrypted using a hash function. Thus, highly secure data management can be implemented.
home_fourth_block_third_line_text: While data encryption increases security, transparency and integrity of transactions can be compromised. In this regard, the blockchain stores the same information in several blocks. As a result, we managed to increase security and at the same time maintain transparency of information.
home_fifth_block_first_line_text: A smart contract is a blockchain contract, a program that automatically executes contracts and transactions when conditions are met. In addition, it has the peculiarity that neither a person nor a third party can change data, and it has excellent transparency, as well as many advantages, such as the ability to speed up contracts and transactions by automating and eliminating human errors.
home_fifth_block_second_line_text: can help you to join the era of electronic document management with all these advantages.
